libexslt Reference Manual

exsltexports

exsltexports - macros for marking symbols as exportable/importable.

Author(s): Igor Zlatkovic <igor@zlatkovic.com>

Synopsis

#define LIBEXSLT_PUBLIC;
#define _REENTRANT;
#define EXSLTCALL;
#define EXSLTPUBFUN;
#define EXSLTPUBVAR;

Description

Details

Macro EXSLTCALL

#define EXSLTCALL;

Macro EXSLTPUBFUN

#define EXSLTPUBFUN;

Macro EXSLTPUBVAR

#define EXSLTPUBVAR;

Macro LIBEXSLT_PUBLIC

#define LIBEXSLT_PUBLIC;

Macro _REENTRANT

#define _REENTRANT;
